sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Settings, AlertTriangle, Car, Heart, Users, Shield } from 'lucide-react'; const ControlPanel = ({ currentScenario, setCurrentScenario, manualOverride, setManualOverride }) => { const scenarios = [ { id: 'normal', label: 'Normal', description: 'Standard traffic flow', icon: , color: 'text-success-600' }, { id: 'heavy', label: 'Heavy', description: 'Rush hour traffic', icon: , color: 'text-warning-600' }, { id: 'accident', label: 'Accident', description: 'Emergency incident', icon: , color: 'text-danger-600' }, { id: 'ambulance', label: 'Ambulance', description: 'Emergency vehicle priority', icon: , color: 'text-danger-600' } ]; const systemStats = { aiConfidence: 94, activeSensors: 45, totalIntersections: 12, responseTime: '0.8s' }; return (

Control Panel

System configuration and scenarios

{/* Scenario Selection */}

Traffic Scenario

{scenarios.map((scenario) => ( ))}
{/* Manual Override */}

Manual Override

{manualOverride ? 'AI optimization is disabled. Manual control active.' : 'AI optimization is managing traffic flow automatically.' }

{manualOverride && (
Override Active - Manual Control Only
)}
{/* System Status */}

System Status

AI Confidence
{systemStats.aiConfidence}%
Active Sensors {systemStats.activeSensors}/48
Intersections {systemStats.totalIntersections}
Response Time {systemStats.responseTime}
{/* Quick Actions */}

Quick Actions

{/* System Info */}
Version: MobilityX v2.1.4
Uptime: 127h 42m
Last Update: {new Date().toLocaleDateString()}
); }; export default ControlPanel;
